name: Bundle Drop
description:
Ever wanted to catch lots of falling Bundle Babies? Well now's your chance!
In this game you will be playing as a sentient pair of hands trying to catch as many falling Bundle Babies as possible! Gain those precious points for your dopamine hit, but don't drop too many or you'll lose.

Key Features:

  • Falling Bundle Babies
  • Moveable hands
  • Health bar
  • Points
  • High scores (not really, this isn't implemented)
  • A sense of joy?
